<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mighty Bulwark](/Feats.aspx?ID=6413) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=264), [Stalwart Defender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=205) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6409)

</column>

---

Thanks to the incredible connection you have forged with your armor, you can use it to shrug off an extensive array of dangers. Your bonus from the [bulwark](/Traits.aspx?ID=549) armor trait increases from +3 to +4, and it applies on all Reflex saves, not just damaging Reflex saves.
name: Mighty Bulwark
